member.name: T:ManagedNativeWifi.Common.DisposableContainer`1
member.summary: Container of disposable object
member.remarks: If a disposable object is given as content when this container is instantiated, the content object will not be disposed when this container is disposed. In contrast, if no disposable object is given (if it is default, in the case of class, null) as content when this container is instantiated, a new disposable object is instantiated instead and the content object will be disposed when this container is disposed.

member.name: M:ManagedNativeWifi.NativeWifi.SetProfile(System.Guid,ManagedNativeWifi.ProfileType,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets (adds or overwrites) the content of a specified wireless profile.
member.param: Whether to overwrite an existing profile
member.returns: True if successfully set. False if failed.
member.remarks: If the content of the profile XML is not valid, a Win32Exception will be thrown. In such case, check the reason code in the message and see https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms707394.aspx https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/3ed3d027-5ae8-4cb0-ade5-0a7c446cd4f7#BKMK_AppndxE

member.summary: Sets the position of a specified wireless profile in preference order.
member.returns: True if successfully set. False if failed.

member.summary: Renames a specified wireless profile.
member.returns: True if successfully renamed. False if failed.

member.summary: Deletes a specified wireless profile.
member.returns: True if successfully deleted. False if failed.

member.name: M:ManagedNativeWifi.NativeWifi.GetInterfaceRadio(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets wireless interface radio information of a specified wireless interface.
member.returns: Wireless interface radio information if succeeded. Null if failed.

member.name: M:ManagedNativeWifi.NativeWifi.TurnOnInterfaceRadio(System.Guid)
member.summary: Turns on the radio of a specified wireless interface (software radio state only).
member.returns: True if successfully changed radio state. False if failed.
member.exception: If the user is not logged on as a member of Administrators group.

member.name: M:ManagedNativeWifi.NativeWifi.TurnOffInterfaceRadio(System.Guid)
member.summary: Turns off the radio of a specified wireless interface (software radio state only).
member.returns: True if successfully changed radio state. False if failed.
member.exception: If the user is not logged on as a member of Administrators group.

member.name: M:ManagedNativeWifi.NativeWifi.GetInterfaceAutoConfig(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets information on whether automatic configuration is enabled for a specified wireless interface.
member.returns: True if enabled. False if disabled or failed to get information.

member.name: M:ManagedNativeWifi.NativeWifi.TryDetectBandChannel(System.UInt32,System.Single@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Attempts to detect frequency band and channel from center frequency.
member.returns: True if successfully detected. False if failed.
member.remarks: This method is marked as internal for unit test. As for 5GHz, this method may produce a channel number which is not actually in use. Some channel numbers of 5GHz overlap those of 3.6GHz. In such cases, refer frequency band to distinguish them.
